channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What is gingivitis? How do I know if I have it?
item.description: Do your gums look red and often bleed when you brush them, but they're not painful? If so, you could have the gum disease gingivitis.
